languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, it gains a stacking +100% bonus to damage dealt until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more damage.

languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more damage.

languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и наносит на 100% больше урона.
Падая {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, он получает суммирующийся бонус +100% к наносимому урону до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 Strength and Weapon Skill and deals +100% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff falls unconscious, it gains a stacking +100% bonus to damage dealt until the end of combat.

languages.text:
Siber mastif, +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliği kazanır. +%100 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber mastif, {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düştüğünde verilen hasara üst üste birikebilen +%100 bonus kazanır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text:
El cibermastín recibe +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} e inflige un +100 % de daño adicional.
Cada vez que el cibermastín caiga {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, gana una bonificación acumulativa de +100 % al daño que inflige hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, it gains a stacking +100% bonus to damage dealt until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
El cibermastín recibe +5 de Habilidad de armas y Fuerza e inflige un +100 % de daño adicional.
Cada vez que el cibermastín caiga inconsciente, gana una bonificación acumulativa de +100 % al daño que inflige hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高5点，造成的伤害提高100%。
每当生化獒犬陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，都会获得100%伤害加成效果。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, it gains a stacking +100% bonus to damage dealt until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
生化獒犬的力量、武器技能提高5点，造成的伤害提高100%。
每当生化獒犬陷入昏迷状态时，都会获得100%伤害加成效果。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden.
Wenn ein Cyber-Mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} wird, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren Bonus von +100 % auf verursachten Schaden.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, it gains a stacking +100% bonus to damage dealt until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +5 Stärke und Waffenfähigkeit und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden.
Wenn ein Cyber-Mastiff bewusstlos wird, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren Bonus von +100 % auf verursachten Schaden.

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +5 et inflige +100 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g}, il gagne un bonus cumulable de +100 % aux dégâts infligés jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, it gains a stacking +100% bonus to damage dealt until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de Capacité de combat et de Force de +5 et inflige +100 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff perd connaissance, il gagne un bonus cumulable de +100 % aux dégâts infligés jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が+5され、与えるダメージが+100%上昇する。
サイバーマスチフが{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、戦闘終了まで与えるダメージに+100%のボーナスが付与される。
